CustomField.formula: IF(MobilePhone != NULL , IF ( BEGINS(MobilePhone , ''), SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( MobilePhone , "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", ""),"+", ""), IF ( BEGINS(MobilePhone , '+'), SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( MobilePhone , "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", ""),"+", ""), Null )),Null)
CustomField.label: Formatted Mobile
